What are the treatments for progressive external ophthalmoplegia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of progressive external ophthalmoplegia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Mitochondrial DNA Deletion Syndromes  - Gene Review: Gene Review: POLG-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing
